body.description: Medline SparkleFresh Alcohol-Free Mouthwash features an icy splash of mint that leaves your breath feeling clean and fresh. Alcohol-free formulation is ideal for people with sensitive gums. These mouthwash promote healthy dental hygiene practices and reduce bad breath and germs. Mouthwash in a 4-oz bottle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Back in 1910, A.L. Mills founded Northwest Garment Factory and began making aprons for workers in the Chicago stockyards. Soon his aprons found their way to a group of nuns who were doing double duty as seamstresses at a nearby hospital. The nuns asked A.L if he could make hospital garments – surgeons’ gowns and nursing uniforms – so they could stop sewing and spend more time caring for patients. He said yes and the business was transformed. Almost two decades later, A.L.’s son, Irving, took over. When World War II broke out, he added general medical supplies to his garment offerings, and the business transformed again, becoming Mills Hospital Supply Company. Today, Medline Industries, LP. is a fourth generation, family-owned company and the largest privately held manufacturer and distributor of medical supplies in the US. And, we’re still happily headquartered in the Chicagoland area. Our story continues with you. You’ve probably seen – and used – dozens of Medline products when you were in the hospital, emergency room, urgent care clinic or doctor’s office. Our products – including gowns and scrubs – are found in thousands of care setting all around the globe. But now we’re excited and humbled to be entering one of the most exclusive care settings of all – your home. We make healthcare run better. And now we’re proud to make it run better for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product - Exactly as I remembered it
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mouthwash. I got hooked over two hospital stays. I, personally, like the fact that’s it’s alcohol free and comes in the smaller bottles. Leaves my mouth feeling fresh with just 1 oz of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: I was given a small bottle of this in the hospital and immediately liked it. No burning feeling, no strong medicine or mint taste, and it left my mouth feeling better. Have no desire to buy any other mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband likes it
reviews.reviewText: Makes mouth feel fresh without strong taste

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and Refreshing!
reviews.reviewText: Begun using this mouthwash four years ago while hospitalized. Have enjoyed the clean, refreshing taste since then!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Delivered yesterday. Box was busted open; three bottles missing. Only reason for two stars is I like this mouth wash. Price increased about 65 percent since last purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and does the job!
reviews.reviewText: This size is convenient for use several times a day. I use a fresh one each day, so do not have to wash it unless I need to delay ordering a new batch. I save a few washed containers and fill them with contents from a larger container when necessary. This does the job without tasting too strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My best friend was hospitalized at Good Sam and told me ...
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is pure magic. My best friend was hospitalized at Good Sam and told me how much she loved this stuff. Mostly because she had a dry mouth due to the medications she was on. I tried it and it is refreshing, does not burn your mouth and smells good. I generally don’t get too excited about mouth wash. Really liked this stuff though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouth wash
reviews.reviewText: Very good price and great for people with mint allergies.
Alcohol free was not my best choice.
